metadata.title: CVE-2013-7110 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Transifex command-line client before 0.10 does not validate X.509certificates for data transfer connections, which allows man-in-the-middleattackers to spoof a Transifex server via an arbitrary certificate.  NOTE:this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2013-2073.

criterions.comment: transifex-client package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
